strings.name: english
strings.aircondition1: An electrician used a mobile scaffold to install new air-conditioner in an office. They secured the mobile scaffold and used their own body harness properly during installation[/br][/br] [b]Is there any hazard in this case?[/b]
strings.aircondition2: An electrician used a mobile scaffold to install new air-conditioner in an office. They secured the mobile scaffold and used their own body harness properly during installation[/br] [b]What type of hazard would be?[/b][/br] a. Catch-between the ceiling and air-conditioner[/br] b. Electrocution due to not switching off the main power[/br] c. Fall from mobile scaffold[/br] d. Struck by air-conditioner
strings.exteriorwindow1: Please take a look to the video presenting a worker who is installing an exterior window from inside the building at the 9-th floor.[/br] [b]Is there any hazard in this case?[/b]
strings.exteriorwindow2: Please take a look to the video presenting a worker who is installing an exterior window from inside the building at the 9-th floor.[/br] [b]What type of hazard would be?[/b][/br] a. Lack of scaffold outside the building[/br] b. Lack of safety net outside the building[/br] c. Worker does not wear his gloves during working[/br] d. Struck by a crane hooks
strings.mobilescaffold1: Two workers collaborated to carry out the ceiling installation from a mobile scaffold, which is erected properly along corridor[/br][/br] [b]Is there any hazard in this case?[/b]
strings.mobilescaffold2: Two workers collaborated to carry out the ceiling installation from a mobile scaffold, which is erected properly along corridor[/br][/br] [b]What type of hazard would be?[/b][/br] a. Mobile scaffold collapsed[/br] b. Electrocution[/br] c. Fall due to overstretching the mobile scaffold[/br] d. Caught-between scaffold and wall
strings.ladder1: A worker used a temporary ladder to install a new light.[/br][/br] [b]Is there any hazard in this case?[/b]
strings.ladder2: A worker used a temporary ladder to install a new light.[/br] [b]What type of hazard would be?[/b][/br] a. The ladder collapsed[/br] b. Electrocution[/br] c. Fall from temporary ladder[/br] d. Lack of body harness
strings.boatswain1: A worker used a Boatswain chair to handle the finishing work of exterior window.[/br][/br] [b]Is there any hazard in this case?[/b]
strings.boatswain2: A worker used a Boatswain chair to handle the finishing work of exterior window.[/br] [b]What type of hazard would be?[/b][/br] a. Fall from Boatswain chair due to lack of independent life line.[/br] b. Struck-by falling object.[/br] c. Caught-between Boatswain chair and wall.[/br] d. Lack of body harness.
